meta.description: Optimize the distribution of medical supplies across regions to meet demands at minimum cost.

sets.name: REGIONS
sets.description: Regions involved in the distribution of medical supplies.

params.name: initial_stock
params.description: Initial stock of supplies in each region.

params.name: required_stock
params.description: Required stock of supplies in each region.

params.name: transfer_cost
params.description: Cost of transferring supplies from one region to another.

vars.name: transfer
vars.description: Amount of supplies transferred from one region to another.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(transfer_cost[i][j] * transfer[i][j] for i in REGIONS for j in REGIONS if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of transferring supplies between regions.

constraints.name: balance_region_1
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['1'] + sum(transfer[j]['1'] for j in REGIONS if j != '1') - sum(transfer['1'][j] for j in REGIONS if j != '1')
constraints.description: Ensure region 1 meets its supply requirement.

constraints.name: balance_region_2
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['2'] + sum(transfer[j]['2'] for j in REGIONS if j != '2') - sum(transfer['2'][j] for j in REGIONS if j != '2')
constraints.description: Ensure region 2 meets its supply requirement.

constraints.name: balance_region_3
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['3'] + sum(transfer[j]['3'] for j in REGIONS if j != '3') - sum(transfer['3'][j] for j in REGIONS if j != '3')
constraints.description: Ensure region 3 meets its supply requirement.

constraints.name: balance_region_4
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['4'] + sum(transfer[j]['4'] for j in REGIONS if j != '4') - sum(transfer['4'][j] for j in REGIONS if j != '4')
constraints.description: Ensure region 4 meets its supply requirement.

constraints.name: balance_region_5
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['5'] + sum(transfer[j]['5'] for j in REGIONS if j != '5') - sum(transfer['5'][j] for j in REGIONS if j != '5')
constraints.description: Ensure region 5 meets its supply requirement.
